[[xml-io]]
= XML IO

[.badges]
[.badge-key]##Since Camel Quarkus##[.badge-version]##1.0.0-M5## [.badge-key]##JVM##[.badge-supported]##supported## [.badge-key]##Native##[.badge-supported]##supported##

An XML stack for parsing XML route definitions. A fast an light weight alternative to camel-quarkus-xml-jaxp

== Maven coordinates

[source,xml]
----
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-xml-io</artifactId>
</dependency>
----
